TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSiteMapProvider extends System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider implements class System.IDisposable
Public Class XmlSiteMapProvider Inherits StaticSiteMapProvider Implements IDisposable
public ref class XmlSiteMapProvider : System::Web::StaticSiteMapProvider, IDisposable
type XmlSiteMapProvider = class inherit StaticSiteMapProvider interface IDisposable

summary.span: 类是从 类派生的，并且是 ASP.NET 的默认站点地图提供者。

span.span: The class is derived from the class and is the default site map provider for ASP.NET.

summary.span: 类根据文件扩展名为 .sitemap 的 XML 文件生成站点地图树。

span.span: The class generates site map trees from XML files with the file name extension .sitemap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类从遵循已知架构的 XML 文件加载站点地图数据。The class loads site map data from an XML file that follows a known schema. 站点地图数据由 `` 标记界定，并由嵌套 `` 标记组成。The site map data is bounded by `` tags and consists of nested `` tags. 在站点地图数据的结构上，和类施加了两个约束：Two constraints are imposed by the and classes on the structure of the site map data: - 只能存在一个根节点。Only one root node can exist. - 对于 指定 url 的对象，url 在提供程序的作用域内必须是唯一的。For objects that specify URLs, the URLs must be unique within the scope of the provider. (如果节点不指定 Url，则所有密钥都必须唯一。 ) (For nodes that do not specify URLs, all keys must be unique.) 下面的代码示例演示可与一起使用的 XML 文件的示例 。The following code example shows an example of an XML file that can be used with the . ``` ``` 是 ASP.NET 的默认提供程序，它从名为 web.sitemap 的文件读取 XML 数据，该文件位于 ASP.NET 应用程序的目录结构内。The is the default provider for ASP.NET and it reads XML data from a file named Web.sitemap that is located within the directory structure of the ASP.NET application. 默认情况下，Web web.sitemap 文件位于应用程序根目录中;但是，如果要更改从中加载数据的文件的名称或位置 ，则可以覆盖 Web.config 文件中的默认配置。By default, the Web.sitemap file is located at the application root; however, if you want to change the name or location of the file from which the loads data, you can override the default configuration in your Web.config file. 通过覆盖 Web.config 文件中的默认配置设置，你可以 根据需要为每个 ASP.NET 应用程序定制的行为。By overriding the default configuration settings in your Web.config file, you can tailor the behavior of the for each ASP.NET application, as necessary. 下面的代码示例演示一个 Web.config 文件示例，其中 仍使用，但使用不同的站点映射文件。The following code example demonstrates an example Web.config file, where the is still used, but a different site map file is used. 因为对象中的所有提供程序都 必须唯一命名，所以 Web.config 文件中指定的所有提供程序使用默认的名称，但也被设置为默认提供程序，以便使用，而不是 在默认 ASP.NET 配置中指定的。Because all providers in a object must be named uniquely, the one that is specified in the Web.config file uses a name other than the default but is also set as the default provider so that it will be used instead of the that is specified in the default ASP.NET configuration. > [!NOTE] > 您可以更改站点导航数据文件的名称，但不能更改其扩展名。You can change the name of the site navigation data file, but you cannot change its extension. 仅读取以文件扩展名 web.sitemap 命名的文件中的数据。The only reads data from files that are named with the file name extension .sitemap. ``` ```

summary.span: 在当前提供程序维护的集合中添加一个 对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `node`参数将添加到内部集合，并在其和之间创建父/子关系 `parentNode` 。The `node` parameter is added to an internal collection, and a parent/child relationship is created between it and `parentNode`. 默认情况下，从类派生的类 和 ASP.NET 的默认站点地图提供程序使用 对象的属性 作为其内部集合中的查找密钥。The class, derived from the class and the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the property of a object as a lookup key in its internal collections, by default. 如果 设置了的属性 ，则该属性在提供程序的作用域内必须是唯一的。If the property of the is set, it must be unique within the scope of the provider. 方法尝试基于节点检索节点 。The method attempts to retrieve nodes based on their . 否则，可以使用 属性和相应的 方法来检索节点。Otherwise, you can use the property, and the corresponding method, to retrieve nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将 `providerName` 当前提供程序链接到当前提供程序的子项。The method links `providerName` to the current provider as a child of the current provider. 的根节点 `providerName` 作为的子节点添加到当前提供程序的层次结构中 `parentNode` 。The root node of `providerName` is added to the hierarchy for the current provider as a child node of `parentNode`. 因为父提供程序 在上调用方法 `providerName` ，所以，可能会引发方法中描述的异常 。Because the parent provider calls the method on `providerName`, the exceptions that are described in the method might be thrown.

summary.span: 移除子和父站点地图节点的集合中的所有元素和 对象在内部作为其状态的一部分进行跟踪的站点地图提供程序。

span.span: Removes all elements in the collections of child and parent site map nodes and site map providers that the object internally tracks as part of its state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将重写继承的 方法，以便在基本实现之外提供附加状态清除 ，包括清除其子提供程序跟踪和 属性跟踪机制。The class overrides the inherited method to provide additional state cleanup beyond the basic implementation, including clearing its child provider tracking and the property tracking mechanisms.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现接口的 方法 ，以在站点地图文件从内存中卸载时释放其关联的文件监视器。The class implements the method of the interface to release its associated file monitor when the site map file is unloaded from memory. 此 方法重载调用采用参数的重载， 并将值设置为 `true` 。This overload of the method calls the overload that takes a parameter and sets the value to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true` 如果用户代码调用了方法，则该方法返回 。The method returns `true` if the method is called by user code. 否则 `false` ，如果在 运行时终结器线程调用方法，它将返回。Otherwise it returns `false`, if the method is called by the finalizer thread during run time.

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.SiteMapNode FindSiteMapNode(string rawUrl) cil managed

public: override System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ FindSiteMapNode(System::String ^ rawUrl);
override this.FindSiteMapNode : string -> System.Web.SiteMapNode

param.name: rawUrl
param.span: 标识要为其检索 的页的 URL。

span.span: A URL that identifies the page for which to retrieve a .

summary.span: 检索表示位于指定 URL 处的页的 对象。

span.span: Retrieves a object that represents the page at the specified URL.

returns.span: 一个 ，表示由 所标识的页。

span.span: A that represents the page identified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象重写 方法，以确保在基类的实现未返回指定 URL 的节点时，为任何链接的子提供程序搜索节点。The object overrides the method to ensure that any linked child providers are searched for the node if the implementation of the base class does not return a node for the specified URL. `rawUrl`参数应为绝对虚拟路径或相对于应用程序的路径，具体取决于在 XML 站点地图数据文件中指定的方式。The `rawUrl` parameter should be either an absolute virtual path or an application-relative path, depending on how it is specified in the XML site map data file. 从派生的类和类使用对象的 URL 作为类维护的各种集合中的键。The class and classes that are derived from it use the URL of a object as a key in the various collections that the class maintains. 因此，这些 Url 在站点地图范围内必须是唯一的。Therefore, these URLs must be unique within the scope of the site map. 如果在由管理的直接站点地图数据中找不到该 URL ，它将 通过 `provider` 其站点地图节点的属性在每个子提供程序上调用。If the URL is not found within the immediate site map data that is managed by the , it calls the on each child provider that is linked to it through the `provider` attribute of its site map nodes. 方法间接调用 方法以检索站点地图中的顶级节点。The method indirectly calls the method to retrieve the top-level node in the site map. 因此，当调用方法时，该方法发生的任何异常 也可能发生 。Therefore, any exceptions that occur for the method can also occur when calling the method.

exception.span: 链接到当前站点地图提供程序的子提供程序返回一个无效节点。

span.span: A child provider linked to the current site map provider returned a node that is not valid.

param.name: key

returns.span: 表示 所标识的页的 ；如果启用了安全修整并且不能向当前用户显示该节点，或者未能通过 在节点集合中找到该节点，则为 。

span.span: A that represents the page identified by ; otherwise, , if security trimming is enabled and the node cannot be shown to the current user or the node is not found by in the node collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果基类的实现未返回的节点，则类会重写方法，以确保搜索节点的任何链接子提供程序 `key` 。The class overrides the method to ensure that any linked child providers are searched for the node, if the implementation for the base class does not return a node for `key`. 默认情况下，从 类和 ASP.NET 的默认站点地图提供程序派生的对象 在其内部集合中使用对象的属性作为查找键。The object, derived from the class and the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the property of a object as a lookup key in its internal collections, by default. 如果 设置了的属性 ，则该属性在提供程序的作用域内必须是唯一的。If the property of the is set, it must be unique within the scope of the provider. 如果未 指定，则 会自动生成 以跟踪节点。If no is specified, the automatically generates a to track the nodes. 此 方法可能会 在与当前提供程序关联的任何子提供程序上调用方法。The method might call the method on any child providers that are associated with the current provider. 因此，可能会引发方法中所述的异常 。Therefore, the exceptions that are described in the method might be thrown.

exception.span: 链接到当前站点地图提供程序的子提供程序返回一个无效节点。

span.span: A child provider linked to the current site map provider returned a node that is not valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 `providerName` 从当前提供程序的层次结构中删除，其中包括由 当前提供程序的站点地图节点与删除的提供程序之间的方法所建立的所有父/子关系。The method removes `providerName` from the hierarchy for the current provider, including any parent/child relationships that are established by the method between site map nodes of the current provider and the removed provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性调用 方法来检索站点地图中的顶级节点。The property calls the method to retrieve the top-level node in the site map. 因此， 在访问该属性时，也可能发生该方法发生的任何异常 。Therefore, any exceptions that occur for the method can also occur when accessing the property. 和 类仅允许站点地图中有一个根 对象。The and classes permit only one root object in a site map. 类将重写抽象 属性，并提供一个用于跟踪根节点的简单实现。The class overrides the abstract property and provides a simple implementation to track the root node.
